bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Potential Bug] ml_single_set_gst_info handles TFLITE & CUSTOM only
bug.description: ml_single_set_gst_info() of nnstreamer-capi-single.c supports ML_NNFW_TYPE_{TENSORFLOW_LITE, CUSTOM_FILTER} only. What about other frameworks and hardware accelerators?

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2326>#2326</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/myungjoo>@myungjoo</denchmark-link> Yes, should treat all the frameworks supported by the single-api same. in should be able to handle if this the set info is supported or not and return more detailed errors than just .
